TopicTitle: Cube Space Station! Re-Engineering the Space Station

Articles.Content:
Re-Engineering how you build Space Stations!

I had the idea that space station can be Long, round or even circular but I haven't seen a cubical space station.

So I have tasked myself to see if a cubical space station will work will it be stable? can you actually build it? and Who ate all the snacks?

If this works I may see if we can add to it to find out how large we can build it
